I tried with the same settings I use when playing cyberpunk and KSP 1. It works for a few minutes but then lags heavily before crashing the game, even in the VAB.

Is it working better for anyone?

AMD link seems to work better but only to my phone (probably not a KSP issue).

I did not come across any issues at all when using in-house streaming to my laptop, used it the whole evening yesterday. Ran super stable and fluent. 

The rig actually running the game is stable as well when playing on it, as for system specs it exceeds recommended specifications.
